name: Icelandic Confederation of Labour
goal: Icelandic Confederation of Labour (ASI) is a Trade Union Confederation with affillated federations and unions in all industries covering both the private and public sectors. The principle tasks of ASI is to service its affilliated organisations and to represent them in dialogue and negotiations at national level, with the employers organisations, the political system and the state. ASI also repersents the trade union movement in governmental bodies and agencies and in international organisations.
interests: Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Youth
euInitiatives: ASI participates in the Social Dialogue at EU level as member of ETUC. ASI also follows developments in various areas related to EEA and the Single Market as well as promoting the interests of Icelandic workers at EEuropean level.
